title: The Pirate
description: Larissa’s new role as Captain of a pirate airship was never going to be simple. The mess of events that lead to her change of career don’t seem to be abating. Can she convince her crew to stick around through all the unusual and dangerous events? Or will she succumb to the mounting pressure and grief that others impose on her at every turn? The unravelling mysteries from her past mingle perilously with airships, fights, and explosions galore.The Pirate is book 2 of the Blood and Destiny Series, following on directly from the events of The Machine.
author: E.C. Jarvis
